trans-unit.source: Provides a safe handle that can be used by Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un handle safe che pu√≤ essere utilizzato dagli oggetti Cryptography Next Generation (CNG).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Releases a handle used by a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia un handle utilizzato da un oggetto Cryptography Next Generation (CNG).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'handle viene rilasciato correttamente. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases a native handle used by a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia un handle nativo utilizzato da un oggetto Cryptography Next Generation (CNG).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'handle viene rilasciato correttamente. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
